info.title: Another star tunnel
info.summary: I grew up with Amiga and Atari ST and star tunnels were an important demo effect at that time so naturally I wanted to recreate the feeling. Inspired by P_Malin's 'Star Tunnel'

info.title: Complex atanh math FTW
info.summary: Based on the very cool shader 'Complex Atanh' by mla.

info.title: Dreams of amber
info.summary: Dreams of amber is an impression of amber screens of old.

info.title: Glowing torus
info.summary: Toruses are cool and neat and this based on a popular shader I created.

info.title: Happy little windows terminal
info.summary: Creating shader sometimes the best results come from 'Happy Accidents' as Bob Ross used to say.

info.title: Memories of green
info.summary: Memories of green is an impression of the hercules screen of old

info.title: Neonwave sunrise
info.summary: Neonwave sunrise is a shader version of art shared by @shreythecray(Twitter)

info.title: Neonwave sunset
info.summary: Neonwave sunset is an attempt to recreate the common neonwave theme of driving along a road into the sunset.

info.title: The Decepticons
info.summary: The Decepticons logo with a metallic finish and red background

info.title: Thindal
info.summary: I liked the twitch streamer Thindal graphics and wanted to create something inspired by it, also borrowed ideas from BigWing's 'The Universe Within'

info.title: WCOM AB
info.summary: I used to work with @devlead and @tobiasandersson at WCOM AB. Created this WCOM shader for them.
